articles.author: Dan Milmo
articles.title: Biden trade curbs on China risk huge damage to US tech sector, says Nvidia chief - The Guardian
articles.description: Jensen Huang says Chinese firms will ‘just build it themselves’ if they cannot buy from US
articles.content:
The US risks causing enormous damage to its tech industry if it continues restrictions on trade with China, according to the chief executive of the chipmaker Nvidia.
Jensen Huang said curbs introduc… [+7486 chars]
